body:
The kernel was built with commit r274401, which [includes the fix](https://svnweb.freebsd.org/base/head/sys/kern/sched_4bsd.c?view=log&pathrev=274401) for the FreeBSD bug linked above.

> the next step is to verify that this particular loop is the one that is generating all the sched_yield calls.

Any idea on how to do so?
